# isPlayingAudio(for:)

**Instance Method**

Called to check if the tab is currently playing audio.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func isPlayingAudio(for context: WKWebExtensionContext) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **context**: The context in which the web extension is running.

## Discussion

Defaults to `NO` if not implemented.
title: isPlayingAudio(for:)
